entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:41 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 02:00 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -11.8°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -13.6°C
Wind: W 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle and flurries ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 10:09 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 10:09 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 10:09 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
